description: You have spent your life in the service of a temple to a specific god or pantheon of gods.
backEquip: Holy Symbol Related to your God
feature: Shelter of the Faithful: You command the respect of those who share your faith, and you can perform the religious ceremonies of your deity. You and your adventuring companions can expect to receive free healing and care at a temple, shrine, or other established presence of your faith (Though you must provide material components needed for spells). Those who share your religion will support you (But only you) at a modest lifestyle. You also declare on specific temple dedicated to your deity or pantheon, and you have a residence there. While near it you can call upon the priests for assistance provided the assistance you ask for is not hazardous and you remain in good standing with the temple.
